name: Terrence Robinson
story: Terrence Robinson was born and raised in a military family. His father served in the army as a general and his mother was a war correspondent. From a young age, Terrence was fascinated by the military and eventually followed in his father's footsteps. He quickly rose up the ranks thanks to his tactical knowledge and leadership skills. Despite having a tough exterior, Terrence has a soft spot for his troops and always puts his men before himself. His ultimate goal is to make it to the top and become a general, just like his father before him.
